sourcesContent:
New User Registration Form

User Full name is required.
User Full name must be at least 5 characters.
Employee Number cannot be more than 50 characters.
Username is required.
Username must be at least 5 characters.
Username cannot be more than 10 characters.
Email is required.
Invalid email format.
Email cannot be more than 100 characters.
Password is required.
Password must be exactly 5 characters.
Password must be exactly 10 characters.
